ResearchProjectDef.label: genetic alteration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the Tissue Grinder and Genome Extractor Table to create genoframes and genomes respectively.

rulesStrings.li: subject->unveiling genetic fabrics
subject_story->embarked on the journey to manipulate the very blueprint of life, crafting tools to unravel and reweave genetic threads
subject_story->created the Tissue Grinder and Genome Extractor Table, key instruments in the quest to understand and harness genetic potential
subject_gerund->laying the groundwork for a future where biology meets creativity

ResearchProjectDef.label: genetic creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create new hybrids with the Genomorpher, gestate them in an Electrowomb and create boosters at the Genetics Tinkering Table.

rulesStrings.li: subject->the architects of life
subject_story->transcended traditional breeding, employing the Genomorpher to forge new forms of life
subject_story->ushered in the age of the Electrowomb, where gestation becomes a process guided by precision and intent
subject_gerund->sculpting the living world with visionary hands

ResearchProjectDef.label: genetic duplication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Manufacture Template Genomes through the Genome Recombinator and duplicate existing Genomes.

rulesStrings.li: subject->mirroring life
subject_story->mastered the art of genomic replication, ensuring valuable genetic traits can be preserved and replicated
subject_story->innovated with the Genome Recombinator, a breakthrough in the efficient duplication of genetic material
subject_gerund->duplicating the essence of life for prosperity and progress

ResearchProjectDef.label: genetic augmentation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grow bio-engineered implants for hybrids and animals alike on the Implant augmentator.

rulesStrings.li: subject->fusing flesh and innovation
subject_story->pioneered the growth of bio-engineered implants, merging organic life with enhancements
subject_story->explored the possibilities of augmentation, not just for survival but for the evolution of abilities
subject_gerund->cultivating the next step in organismal advancement

ResearchProjectDef.label: genetic compatibility
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grow bio-engineered implants for humans on the Implant augmentator.

rulesStrings.li: subject->bridging genomes
subject_story->extended the boundaries of bio-engineering to humans, ensuring compatibility between their biology and the myriad forms of life
subject_story->focused on the harmony of existence, where human potential can be expanded through genetic synergy
subject_gerund->harmonizing human essence with the genetic chorus of the cosmos

ResearchProjectDef.label: genetic mechahybridization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create Biomechanical Lab beacons to find mechahybridizers, and construct mechahybrid antennas to support more mechanoid hybrids.

rulesStrings.li: subject->the synthesis of organic and machine
subject_story->ventured into uncharted territories, blending organic life with mechanoid essence to birth new forms of existence
subject_story->established the Biomechanical Lab, a beacon for those who dare to redefine life's boundaries
subject_gerund->forging the future with strands of DNA and circuits entwined
